ygData.subject: Re: Bard shop in Erudin?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Rather than dropping hints that it is or isn t in the library (oops, did I just give it away?) the real question is, why bother to buy this song, since it
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Sat, 3 Apr 1999, SteelWolf wrote:
> >
> > The Eq'lizer site lists the only place that sells the Level 14 song
> > Lyssa's Cataloging Libretto as Erudin. Can anyone give me a general idea
> > of where in Erudin this shop is (e.g. by the palace, by the docks,
> > etc.).
>
> Where would you find a CATALOGing LIBRetto? Where would
> Erudites store their vast COLLECTION OF BOOKS containing all
> their KNOWLEDGE about songs and spells? :-)

Rather than dropping hints that it is or isn't in the library (oops, did I
just give it away?) the real question is, why bother to buy this song, since
it is currently completely useless. :(

Jyzan
